title: Mkx mobile - Dunk Master Darius
body:
Had an idea of putting league characters into the mkx mobile game.

Tier - Diamond (stats to be added by developers)
Class - Outworld (or Nomad)
Can equipt 3 items only as has his own items.

Passive - Darius combo enders and abilities always add a bleed DOT and can stack upto 5 times. If the opponent is slain with 5 stacks gets transfered to the next enemy. (Stacks with allies bleed stacks)
Darius also owns an item "Darius axe" which gets fused everytime he does

 (infusing Darius to X infuses his axe to X)

Darius axe -
 X-ray deals ()% extra damage per stack of bleed on the enemy.
At infusion X - if Darius X-rays a karacter with 5 stacks of bleed his X ray becomes a fatality which refunds 3 bars of power.

Abilities.

Sp1- hard attack which power drains (not part of his kit but stong ability to have on a hyoer carry. (Kenshi sp1)

Sp2 - attack which greatly increases power generation (like his q) (like jason Voorhees sp2)

X-ray - high damage. (His item gives him passives for his X-ray.

Strategy - Using darius with a character like scorge Baraka who can increase bleed stacks and piercing Mileena who seals extra damage to bleeding enemies.

Poor synergies - characters with killing passives (elder god kenshi)

Strong against - balanced teams

Counters - resurect enemies (warlock quan chi. Jason) or evade enemies (assassin jade)
Can also take a while to get enough bleed stacks
